liste.punkt: Arrange with your employer when you are going to work and your employment percentage.
Your employer confirms the employment period in the income statement that they send to NAV.
If you have already applied, log in at Your parental benefit and submit a modification application.

lesmer.avsnitt: Application deadline: You must apply before you start working.

lesmer.intro: If you are self-employed or a freelancer

liste.punkt: In the parental benefit application, you specify that you are delaying the period because you are working or that you are working part time.
If you have already applied, log in at Your parental benefit and submit a modification application.

lesmer.avsnitt: Application deadline: You must apply before you start working.
